prompts: Create a Pokemon that can unleash powerful sound waves with a vibrant purple body.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a creature from a cave, known for its loud cries.
Generate a Pokemon that has a large mouth and can make sonic attacks, with a unique color scheme.
Make a Pokemon with a hefty physique that can vibrate the ground with its voice.
Imagine a creature that thrives in urban areas and has striking golden accents on its head.
Design a Pokemon that looks like it could belong to a rock concert with its loud and boisterous personality.
Show me a Pokemon with a playful demeanor that loves to echo through forests and mountains.
